li.label: kill catharsis
li.description: Peace. But it is only a temporary reprieve.

li.label: want to kill someone
li.description: The voices won't stay appeased for much longer.

li.label: need to kill someone
li.description: The voices grow restless. They tell me to find my next target, or they'll do it for me.

li.label: must kill someone
li.description: The voices are all shouting, arguing amongst each other. My dreams are filled with clashing swords and hot blood.

li.label: MUST KILL MUST KILL MUST KILL
li.description: My heart beats like a drum, the voices shout like great trumpets. The time has come.

li.description: There aren't quite enough people eating nutrient paste.

li.label: meager paste consumption
li.description: So few people are eating nutrient paste. Don't they know it's the meal of the future?

li.label: pitiful paste consumption
li.description: Practically nobody is eating nutrient paste! All I can think about is all of those wasted nutrients.
